ygData.subject: Re: Fish Scales
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Unfortunately Verant decided it would be too unbalancing for the stones to be stackable so they are lore and one charge only. *sigh* -- Artificial
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, Feb 07/00, Carlos Ugarte <cau@...> wrote:
> From: Carlos Ugarte <cau@...>

>... A good
> idea would be to have a magician summon a couple of the appropriate
> rings or stones for everyone who doesn't have a Fishbone Earring or
> an Aqualung or a Rebreather. That way they have something ready in
> case of an emergency.
>

Unfortunately Verant decided it would be too unbalancing for the stones
to be stackable so they are lore and one charge only.

*sigh*

--
